posts.title: Welcome to the Boats for Charity Blog
posts.summary: A quick welcome and overview of what we'll share here: boat donation guides, tax tips, and real stories from donors and families helped.
posts.body:
Welcome to the Boats for Charity blog!

Here we will share simple guides about how boat donation works, what to expect during the process, honest talk about timelines and paperwork, and real stories about how vessels are turned into practical help for people who need it.

If you have a question you would like us to answer in a post, just reply to your confirmation email or reach out through the contact link on our site.
